basicInfo.name: Sera
basicInfo.flavor: \"Ballista calls me a Master of Wraiths... But Friend of Wraiths seems more fitting, right? Don't you agree?\

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Gloating Wraiths
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 72% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Damage: Each attack deals additional damage equal to 32% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.

Skill 2.name: Shadow Wraiths
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 175% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Damage: Deals additional damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.

Passive.name: Shadow Lightning
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 27%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.dislikes: Justice, boredom, being chastised, being treated like a child, being ostracized
profile.story: \"Ballista calls me a Master of Wraiths... But Friend of Wraiths seems more fitting, right? Don't you agree?\

basicInfo.name: Sera
